name: files
description:
In order to organize my files
As a user
I want to have basic file management

comments.value: # these are the files hosted on demo.owncloud.org

steps.name: I should see a new button
I should see an upload action

I should see a delete action for <entry>

I click on the new <type> action

name: Login
description:
In order to protect data in my cloud instance
As an user
I want restricted access to my cloud

steps.name: I should be able to access my cloud

name: share files with link
description:
In order to collaborate with others
As a user
I want to share files with a link

steps.name: I go to the files app
I click on the share file action
I should see a "Share with link" checkbox
I go to the files app
I click on the share file action
I click the "share with link" action
I should see the share with link icon
I should see a URL to the file in the share with link text input
I go to the files app
I hover over a file shared with a link

arguments.val: a file shared with a link

steps.name: I should see the share with link icon
I go to the files app
I hover over a file not shared with a link

arguments.val: a file not shared with a link

steps.name: I should not see the share with link icon
I have shared a file with link
I go to the files app
I click on the share file action
I deselect the "share with link" action
I should not see a URL to the file
I chould not see share with link text input

name: share files with user
description:
In order to collaborate with other owncloud users
As a user
I want to share files with other users

steps.name: I go to the files app
I click on the share file action
I should see a share with text input
I go to the files app
I click on the share file action
I should see the share with user icon
I should see the username in the list of shared users
I go to the files app
I hover over a file shared with a user

arguments.val: a file shared with a user

steps.name: I should see the share with user icon
I go to the files app
I hover over a file not shared with a user

arguments.val: a file not shared with a user

steps.name: I should not see the share with user icon
I go to the files app
I click on the share file action
I hover over the user I shared the file with

arguments.val: the user I shared the file with

steps.name: I should see a "can edit" checkbox
I should see an unshare action
I go to the files app
I click on the share file action
I hover over the user I shared the file with

arguments.val: the user I shared the file with

steps.name: I click on the unshare action
I should not see the username in the list of shared users
